name: The 5th Int'l Conference on Molecular, Atomic, Nuclear and Particle Physics
content: The 5th Int'l Conference on Molecular, Atomic, Nuclear and Particle Physics (MANPP 2018) will be held from December 1-3, 2018 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Molecular, Atomic, Nuclear and Particle. MANPP 2018 dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
